name: The Keep (itch) (David Filipe)
description:
The forces of Evil are swarming all around you.
After several days of fighting them off,
you and your faithful companion are all that remains of humanity. 

Hold the Keep,
 keep  yourself alive,
but most importantly,
keep it alive.

CONTROLS

F - Stay/Follow
WASD - Move
Arrows - Shoot (Can’t shoot while the dog is following)
Esc - Quit

Made by David Filipe
for Ludum Dare 46
